Question: If Tom Lefroy later visited Hampshire, he was carefully kept away from the ____s, and this person never saw him again.
Hints: This person's works brought her little personal renown because they were published anonymously.
This person lived her entire life as part of a close-knit family located on the lower fringes of the English landed gentry.
This person was subsequently educated at home, until leaving for boarding school with her sister Cassandra early in 1785.
